author: PinkySmile,WonderMaze
description:
Another boring day for Remilia...
Or so she thought, until half of Gensokyo invaded
her mansion after hearing a strange rumor.
But who is this mysterious intruder
everyone is talking about?
name: Babylon's Aurora

scenarios.description:
2a 5c hj9 j5c j66 j8a | Works everywhere

It is but another day, the weather is even, the
tea is good, and no disturbances are to be seen.
Basically a normal, boring, tedious day for
Remilia Scarlet.
Yet, without her knowing, it would be a day
that she would remember for a while.
scenarios.name: The Soul Capturing Intruder

scenarios.description:
d6 j5aa d6 j5aa d6 j5aa | Works everywhere
d6 j5aa d6 j5aa d6 j5a j8a | Optimized version

Something broke the monotony, and that is all
Remilia Scarlet needs to dive into the mystery.
But if the rumors are true, why does she
not know about it?
She is the mistress of this mansion after all,
and her servants are numerous...
Why wasn't she informed!?
scenarios.name: A Crimson Maid Day-to-Day

scenarios.description:
5aaaa 4SC(Gungnir) hj9 j8a
Ender only midscreen, near corner and corner

Well it seems like the chief maid fell short
to give an answer.
However the guard might have an inkling on
what is going on...
Even if she wouldn't bet on it.
scenarios.name: A Long Lullaby

scenarios.description:
j2a CH 2c hj9 j5c j66 j8a | Works everywhere

And now that clues were found it is time to do
in-depth research.
Fortunately for Remilia Scarlet, she has quite
the sizable library which is, unsurprisingly,
her next stop.
After all, she has a bookworm friend there
who should be of help. What? You didn't think
she would do the research by herself, did you?
scenarios.name: Her Voynich Enigma

scenarios.description:
3a 2a 5c d236b | Tip of 3a only

It seems by searching for the intruder she
found another uninvited, yet unsurprising
guest but it seems all this situation has done
is bring many strange visitors to her place.
Maybe she would have been annoyed if she
wasn't so bored.
scenarios.name: Salem's trick

scenarios.description:
5aaaa 6a 5c | Corner only

After the uninvited but the unsurprising,
comes one that is expected to be here,
yet, surprising to see nonetheless.
scenarios.name: The Iron Masked Girl

scenarios.description:
Rising j5aa j6a j5b | Works everywhere

There are actually many maids in this manor of
hers: a lot of fairies who were influenced by
Remilia Scarlet's powerful charisma, probably
inherited from her noble lineage...
Though it seems the quality of those maids
are not what it used to be.
scenarios.name: A Tomboyish Maid

scenarios.description:
d6 j5aa d6 j5aa 2c hj9 j5aa | Corner only

The greatest enemy of Remilia Scarlet enters
the fray.
It is time for payback and also to shed
some light onto this case.
scenarios.name: The Curtain Fall?

scenarios.description:
4a 4a 4a 4a 5SC(Cradle) 2a 2c hj8 j2c j66 j8a
Monsoon only combo

Perhaps have you noticed the rather strange
individual that is Remilia Scarlet. She might
be the mistress of this manor and of all its
inhabitants, but what she likes the most is not
really to be the shining star on the scene. The
role she plays is only secondary. No,what truly
matters to her, is to never remain a spectator.
scenarios.name: Curtain Rise On Mr.Norton
